text:
The Mayor is hereby authorized to adopt rules and regulations supplemental to this Chapter and not in conflict therewith, said rules and regulations to become effective 10 days after the Mayor causes their publication in a newspaper of general circulation within the City and County of San Francisco. 
(Added by Ord. 290-72, App. 10/10/72; amended by Ord. 243-00, File No. 001309, App. 10/27/2000)
